page.title: 06Rounders on Garway Common
page.content: Every Tuesday evening (weather permitting) there is rounders on Garway Common. People turn up from as far afield as St.Weonards. The age range is from 8 years to about 60. The equipment is kept in a nearby person's garden shed. The grass is cut and the pitch marked out by the locals with the Sports Club equipment. The game is great fun and is not played to win. Most of the adult players are women, but men join in as well. In the summer we can keep playing until around 9 o'clock. Opposite the Common there is the Garway Moon Inn, which is very convenient. All players are very welcome wherever they have come from. Although sometimes the sides aren't fair it doesn't really matter. Usually there are enough people to play 7 a side.
